alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cherry County through 615 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Kilgore to 13 miles northwest of Brownlee. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Valentine, Crookston, Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River, Big Alkali Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Schlagel Creek State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 181 and 196. Highway 97 between mile markers 114 and 140. Highway 83 between mile markers 214 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
